summary: PE00020; ORIGINAL EQUIPMENT ON A FLEETWOOD, TERRY 1995. ONE OF  FRONT AND ONE OF THE BACK TIRES BLEWOUT WHILE DRIVING AT 65 MPH.  FRONT TIRE GOT REPLACED, THEN ON JUNE 22,2000 OTHER BLEWOUT.  CONSUMER BROUGHT ANOTHER TIRE.      ON A 1997 FORD F250, CONSUMER WAS MAKING A TURN AND LOST POWER STEERING, CONSUMER WENT STRAIGHT INTO A PARKING LOT.  ALUMINUM TUBING WAS SOFT. WHEN DEALER PUT A  NEW ONE ITWAS MADE FROM A STRONGER MATERIAL.*AK GOODYEAR 225/75/R15 *MW
